motion_type.description: Type of motion to be simulated.

displacement.description: Initial displacement of the object from the reference position.

speed.description: Constant speed of the object in linear motion.

radius_of_path.description: Radius of the circular path for circular motion.

angular_velocity.description: Angular velocity of the object in circular motion.

amplitude.description: Maximum displacement from the mean position in periodic motion.

frequency.description: Frequency of oscillation in periodic motion.

medium_resistance.description: Resistance offered by the medium, causing damping in motion.

initial_position.description: Initial position of the object at the start of observation.

observation_duration.description: Total duration for which the motion is observed.
